member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase
member.summary: Abstract base class for an AOP interceptor that logs method calls and exceptions that occur during the method call.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase.#ctor(BerwickHeights.Platform.PerfTest.Svc.IPerfTestSvc,BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.CurrentUser.ICurrentUserSvc,BerwickHeights.Platform.Core.Logging.ILogger)
member.summary: Constructor used when running performance tests

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase.InterceptMethodCall(System.Object,System.String,System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Reflection.ParameterInfo},System.Collections.Generic.IList{System.Object},System.Type)
member.summary: Implementing type can use this to log the method call (if isLogMethodCall is set to true) and log any exceptions that are caught. The method calls the abstract method ProceedWithMethodCall() when it is time to call the intercepted method. The data object passed into this method is returned in the call to ProceedWithMethodCall().
member.param: Implementation-specific data (e.g., invocation data) that is returned in the call to ProceedWithMethodCall().
The type of the target class.
The name of the method being intercepted.
The parameters of the method being intercepted.
The argument values of the method being intercepted.
The return type of the method being intercepted.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase.ProceedWithMethodCall(System.Object)
member.summary: Inheriting type implements this by calling the intercepted method call. The data parameter is the value that was originally passed to InterceptMethodCall(). Returns the value that is returned from the intercepted method call.
member.param: The value that was originally passed to InterceptMethodCall()
member.returns: Returns the value that is returned from the intercepted method call.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase.Config
member.summary: Gets or sets interceptor's configuration data.

member.name: T:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase.ConfigData
member.summary: Configuration structure used in the methods dump control.

member.name: M:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase.ConfigData.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Creates method dump config data initializing DumpMethodParameters and DumpMethodReturnValue.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase.ConfigData.DumpMethodParameters
member.summary: Gets or sets parameter that controls if method call parameters are to be dumped or not.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase.ConfigData.DumpMethodReturnValue
member.summary: Gets or sets parameter that controls if method call returned value is to be dumped or not.

member.name: P:BerwickHeights.Platform.MethodLogging.MethodLoggingInterceptorBase.ConfigData.ParameterNameIgnoreList
member.summary: Gets or sets the parameter names that are to be ignored when dumping parameter values (e.g., don't dump password values).
